page.title: 13TORRYBURN
page.content: Torryburn is a small coastal village lying beside Newmills.Amenities here are limited. There is one hotel _{The {Torrie,}and a grocers.Most villagers } will shop in Dunfermline.The village has one church _{Church of Scotland and to the west of the village lies the cemetary. There is a park here beside the sea,with play things for children which is quite popular. There is a small{path along the sea_front}which if followed along the coast leads to Crombie Point. There is one{school}here. It is a fairly large building as it was once a Secondary School. It is now a Primary School with 81 primary children and 62 nursery children.Children from the neighbouring villages of Cairneyhill and Crossford attend the Nursery.
